item.title: Free blog
item.description: Build a blog for free. A free blog is doable if you work in IT, otherwise just pay someone to do it. This blog has three parts: the storage is on GitHub; the framework is Hugo; and the deploy engine is CircleCI. These were just the best fit at the time, free and simple. This simplicity does mean limited functionality but the remit was just a basic blog so this isn‚Äôt an issue.
